definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[פָּגׇ֑שְׁתִּי]] Ge 33:8; 3 pl. consec. [[וּפָֽגְשׁוּ]] Is 34:14; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יִפְגַׇֽשְְׁ֫]] Ge 32:18 (Gi; Baer [[יִֽפְגׇֽשְְׁ֫]]; van d. H. [[יִֽפְגׇּֽשְְׁ֫]]), [[וַיִּפְגְּשֵׁהוּ]] Ex 4:24, Ex 4:27; 3 fs. [[וַתִּפְגַשׁ]] 1Sa 25:20 (rd. prob. [[וַתִּפְגּשׁ]] Ges:§ 47 k, cf. van d. H), etc.; Inf. abs. [[פָּגוֹש]] Pr 17:12; cstr. [[פְּגשׁ]] Je 41:6; —meet, c. acc. Ge 33:8, 1Sa 25:20, Is 34:14, Je 41:6, so c. sf. Ge 32:18, Ex 4:24, Ex 4:27, 2Sa 2:13; meet, encounter, of bear, c. [[ב]] pers. Pr 17:12, of ´[[י]] (like a bear) Ho 13:8 (c. sf. pers.).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: meet together, each other, Pf. 3 pl. [[נִפְגׇּֽשׁוּ]] Pr 22:2, Pr 29:13, fig. of [[חֶסֶד וֶאֱמֶת]] Ps 85:11.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: intens. Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְפַגְּשׁוּ חשֶׁךְ]] Job 5:14 they keep encountering darkness in the daytime.
